org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.xds.core.validate

Interface ValueValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CXiValidator, CXValidator, HashValidator, HomeCommunityIdValidator, LanguageCodeValidator, NopValidator, OIDValidator, PidValidator, PositiveNumberValidator, TimeValidator, XCNValidator, XONValidator, XTNValidator

    public interface ValueValidator
    Provides validation of simple values for compatibility with other data types.
    Author:
    Jens Riemschneider

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      void validate(String value)
      Validates the given value.

        Validates the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value.
        Throws:
        XDSMetaDataException - if the validation failed.
